column4: You are in a hospital. The walls are lined with empty beds and there are broken vials, bottles and needles scattered about
You are in a hallway. The stone bricks are withered and collecting moss.
You are at a T-shaped crossroad. It is too dark to see where each path leads
You are at the end of the hallway.
You are at the front door of a local Lidl grocery store
You are at a standard bathroom. Why does a bathroom have a lock anyway?
